json_to_edit.voice_over: The keys clacked with an otherworldly rhythm, spelling out truths yet to unfold.
json_to_edit.description: Emily discovers a mysterious typewriter that predicts future events.
json_to_edit.location: Dusty attic of an old Victorian house
json_to_edit.name: Prophetic Typewriter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily uncovers a haunted typewriter that writes future events.

qa.action: Emily enters the attic, moonlight revealing stacks of old furniture and boxes.

hf.action: Emily approaches an antique desk with a mysterious typewriter.

tr.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own, startling Emily.

xc.action: Emily reads the typed message, her eyes widening in disbelief.

ka.action: Emily frantically tears the paper from the typewriter, examining it closely.

fn.action: The typewriter begins typing again, predicting another event.

af.action: Emily backs away from the typewriter, clutching the papers, as the attic seems to come alive around her.

edit_command: Change the scene location to an abandoned lighthouse and make the lighting more dramatic with flickering candles

updated_json.voice_over: The keys clacked with an otherworldly rhythm, spelling out truths yet to unfold.
updated_json.description: Emily discovers a mysterious typewriter that predicts future events in an abandoned lighthouse.
updated_json.location: Abandoned lighthouse on a rocky coast
updated_json.lighting: Dramatic, with flickering candlelight casting eerie shadows
updated_json.weather: Clear night with a strong sea breeze
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, creaking metal, distant foghorn
updated_json.name: Prophetic Typewriter
updated_json.scene_summary: Emily uncovers a haunted typewriter that writes future events in an isolated lighthouse.

qa.action: Emily enters the lighthouse keeper's room, flickering candlelight revealing old nautical equipment and a mysterious typewriter.

hf.action: Emily approaches an old desk with the enigmatic typewriter, shadows dancing on the lighthouse walls.

tr.sfx_keywords: gentle sea breeze, ticking of an old clock
tr.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own, startling Emily as candlelight flickers ominously.

xc.action: Emily reads the typed message, her eyes widening in disbelief as shadows shift around her.

ka.sfx_keywords: paper tearing, hurried breathing, creaking floorboards
ka.action: Emily frantically tears the paper from the typewriter, examining it closely in the wavering candlelight.

fn.sfx_keywords: heartbeat, whispering wind, distant waves crashing
fn.action: The typewriter begins typing again, predicting another event as candles flicker more intensely.

af.sfx_keywords: sudden gust of wind, candles guttering, creaking lighthouse
af.action: Emily backs away from the typewriter, clutching the papers, as the lighthouse room seems to come alive around her, shadows looming in the candlelight.

label.rationale: we need to update the scene location from a dusty attic to an abandoned lighthouse. this change requires adjusting several elements of the scene to fit the new setting. we'll modify the location, lighting, ambience sound keywords, and adjust the shots to reflect the new environment. the dramatic lighting with flickering candles will be incorporated into the scene description and relevant shots.
